exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.BrSeatSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:chessCommonLib="chessCommonLib.*" minWidth="10" minHeight="10" width="90" height="90">
	<e:Image id="empty_bg" left="-11" right="-10" top="-10" bottom="-12" source="br_seatHead_png" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
	<chessCommonLib:Head id="head" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="lb_bg_img" source="name_bg_mask_png" bottom="0" left="0" right="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="nickName_lbl" text="aaaaa" size="22" left="0" right="0" textAlign="center" multiline="false" height="22" bottom="25" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="chips_lbl" text="aaaaa" size="22" left="0" right="0" textAlign="center" bottom="0" multiline="false" wordWrap="false" height="22" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.HeadSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  minWidth="10" minHeight="10">
	<e:Image id="avar_img" source="default_avar_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="avarFrame_img" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source=""/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SysMsgMcSkin" width="890" height="56" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
    <e:Image  width="890" height="56"  source="mjl_lobby_systembg_png" />
	<e:Label id="_msgTxt" size="24"  textColor="0xffffff"  fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" multiline="false" verticalAlign="middle"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.Chat2LabaItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="93">
	<e:Image source="chat_userlist_bg_png" scale9Grid="17,13,45,46" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="avar_img" source="chat_laba_icon_png" x="14" y="6.5"/>
	<e:Image id="frame_img" width="60" height="60" x="11.5" y="14" source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="gold_lb" y="15" size="26" textColor="0xfdf4a9" left="66" right="0" maxChars="60" text="{data.text}"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_vip_icon_png" x="65.5" y="7"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.Chat2ListItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="avar_img" y="19" anchorOffsetX="0" width="49" anchorOffsetY="0" height="46" left="0" source="{data.headUrl}"/>
	<e:Label id="name_txt" text="{data.nickName}" x="62" y="20" size="20" textColor="0x14142a" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label id="time_txt" text="{data.time}" y="20" size="20" textColor="0x14142A" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" right="0"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_chat_bg_png" scale9Grid="24,23,84,32" right="0" left="52" bottom="0" top="48" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label id="chat_txt" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="13" left="79" top="62" bottom="12" size="23" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="6" text="{data.words}"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.Chat2ListSkin" width="415" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="396" height="60" x="9" y="653" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image source="chat_input_bg_png" scale9Grid="8,7,49,46" right="0" left="0" bottom="0" top="0" locked="true" />
		<e:Button id="roomType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_room_btn_normal_png" source.down="chat_room_btn_normal_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="labaType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_laba_btn_normal_png" source.down="chat_laba_btn_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" scale9Grid="6,5,38,34" verticalCenter="0" height="44" left="92"
		         right="76" />
		<e:Button id="send_bt" label="" verticalCenter="0.5" x="323">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_send_normal_png" source.down="chat_send_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:EditableText id="chat_etxt" height="31" text="" y="14" anchorOffsetX="0" left="99" right="83"
		                fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0x14142a" size="24" verticalAlign="middle" prompt="请输入聊天内容" />
		<e:Button id="voice_btn" label="" x="282" y="14">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_voice_normal_png" source.down="chat_voice_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Scroller id="chat_scr" left="15" right="15" top="20" bottom="82">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="chat_lst" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.Chat2ListItemSkin" right="0" left="0">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" gap="10" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Group id="chat_select_grp" x="15" y="590">
		<e:Button id="labaDrop_btn" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_laba_drop_normal_png" source.down="chat_laba_drop_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="roomDrop_btn" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_room_drop_normal_png" source.down="chat_room_drop_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.Chat2UserSkin" width="458" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="0" width="420" top="0" bottom="0" source="chat2_bg_png" scale9Grid="12,11,22,24"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="chat_btn" label="" y="199" left="417">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat2_btn_png" source.down="chat2_btn_png" source.disabled="chat2_btn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="noseat_btn" label="" y="368" left="417">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat2_noseat_btn_png" source.down="chat2_noseat_btn_png" source.disabled="chat2_noseat_btn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.User2ListItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="93">
	<e:Image source="chat_userlist_bg_png" scale9Grid="17,13,45,46" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="avar_img" width="55" height="55" x="14" y="17" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="{data.headUrl}"/>
	<e:Image id="frame_img" width="60" height="60" x="11.5" y="14" source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="name_lb" y="10.5" textColor="0xabc2ff" horizontalCenter="37" text="{data.nickName}"/>
	<e:Label id="gold_lb" text="{data.remainder}" y="49" size="26" textColor="0xfdf4a9" horizontalCenter="37"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_coin_png" x="91" y="41" anchorOffsetX="0" width="45" anchorOffsetY="0" height="45"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.User2ListSkin" width="400" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingTip">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{loading_img}">
				<tween:To duration="3000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Scroller width="363" height="680" x="19" y="20">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="noseat_lst" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" right="0" left="0" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.User2ListItemSkin">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" paddingTop="0"/>
				</e:layout>
				<e:ArrayCollection>
					<e:Array>
						<e:Object id="null" headUrl="null" nickName="null" remainder="null"/>
					</e:Array>
				</e:ArrayCollection>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="loading_img" source="chat_loading_png" anchorOffsetX="18" anchorOffsetY="18" x="202" y="361"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatLabaItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="chat_userlist_bg_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="17,13,45,46"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_laba_icon_png" x="14" y="6.5"/>
	<e:Label id="notice_lb" size="26" textColor="0xfdf4a9" left="66" right="0" maxChars="60" text="test" top="15" bottom="20" lineSpacing="10"/>
	<e:Image id="chat_laba_vip_img" source="chat_vip_icon_png" x="65.5" y="7"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatListItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="avar_img" y="19" anchorOffsetX="0" width="49" anchorOffsetY="0" height="46" left="0" source="{data.data.headUrl}"/>
	<e:Label id="name_txt" text="{data.data.nickName}" x="62" y="20" size="20" textColor="0x14142a" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Label id="time_txt" y="20" size="20" textColor="0x14142A" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" right="0" text=""/>
	<e:Image source="chat_chat_bg_png" scale9Grid="24,23,84,32" right="0" left="52" bottom="0" top="48" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label id="chat_txt" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="13" left="79" top="62" bottom="12" size="23" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="6" text="{data.data.words}"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatListSkin" width="415" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="396" height="60" x="9" y="653" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image source="chat_input_bg_png" scale9Grid="8,7,49,46" right="0" left="0" bottom="0" top="0" locked="true" />
		<e:Button id="roomType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_room_btn_normal_png" source.down="chat_room_btn_normal_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="labaType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_laba_btn_normal_png" source.down="chat_laba_btn_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" scale9Grid="6,5,38,34" verticalCenter="0" height="44" left="92"
		         right="76" />
		<e:Button id="send_bt" label="" verticalCenter="0.5" x="323">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_send_normal_png" source.down="chat_send_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:EditableText id="chat_etxt" height="31" text="" y="14" anchorOffsetX="0" left="99" right="83"
		                fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0x14142a" size="24" verticalAlign="middle" prompt="请输入聊天内容" />
		<e:Button id="voice_btn" label="" x="282" y="14">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_voice_normal_png" source.down="chat_voice_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Scroller id="chat_scr" left="15" right="15" top="20" bottom="82">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="chat_lst" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.ChatListItemSkin" right="0" left="0">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" gap="10" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Group id="chat_select_grp" x="15" y="590">
		<e:Button id="labaDrop_btn" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_laba_drop_normal_png" source.down="chat_laba_drop_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="roomDrop_btn" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_room_drop_normal_png" source.down="chat_room_drop_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatUserSkin" width="458" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="0" scale9Grid="12,11,66,72" width="420" top="0" bottom="0" source="chat_noset_bg_png"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="chat_btn" label="" y="216" left="406" locked="true">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_chat_normal_png" source.down="chat_chat_selected_png" source.disabled="chat_chat_selected_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="noseat_btn" label="" y="362" left="409">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_noset_normal2_png" source.down="chat_noset_selected_png" source.disabled="chat_noset_selected_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.UserListItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="93">
	<e:Image source="chat_userlist_bg_png" scale9Grid="17,13,45,46" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="avar_img" width="55" height="55" x="14" y="17" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="{data.headUrl}"/>
	<e:Image id="frame_img" width="60" height="60" x="11.5" y="14" source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="name_lb" y="10.5" textColor="0xabc2ff" horizontalCenter="37" text="{data.nickName}"/>
	<e:Label id="gold_lb" text="{data.remainder}" y="49" size="26" textColor="0xfdf4a9" horizontalCenter="37"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_coin_png" x="91" y="41" anchorOffsetX="0" width="45" anchorOffsetY="0" height="45"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.UserListSkin" width="400" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingTip">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{loading_img}">
				<tween:To duration="3000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Scroller width="363" height="680" x="19" y="20">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="noseat_lst" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" right="0" left="0" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.UserListItemSkin">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" paddingTop="0"/>
				</e:layout>
				<e:ArrayCollection>
					<e:Array>
						<e:Object id="null" headUrl="null" nickName="null" remainder="null"/>
					</e:Array>
				</e:ArrayCollection>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="loading_img" source="chat_loading_png" anchorOffsetX="18" anchorOffsetY="18" x="202" y="361"/>
</e:Skin>
